info.name: Azure DevOps v5.0
info.description:
Azure DevOps Services REST API Reference.

v1.1

request.description:
Generate a SVG badge for the latest version of a package. The generated SVG is typically used as the image in an HTML link which takes users to the feed containing the package to accelerate discovery and consumption.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20badge?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20badge?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: True to return all versions of the package in the response. Default is false (latest version only)
True to return REST Urls with the response. Default is True.

Only applicable for NuGet packages, setting it for other package types will result in a 404. If false, delisted package versions will be returned. Use this to filter the response when includeAllVersions is set to true. Default is unset (do not return delisted packages).
Only applicable for Nuget packages. Use this to filter the response when includeAllVersions is set to true. Default is True (only return packages without prerelease versioning).
Return deleted or unpublished versions of packages in the response. Default is False.
Return the description for every version of each package in the response. Default is False.

request.description:
Get details about a specific package.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20package?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20package?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: True to include urls for each version. Default is true.
Only applicable for NuGet packages. If false, delisted package versions will be returned.
Return deleted or unpublished versions of packages in the response. Default is unset (do not return deleted versions).

request.description:
Get details about a specific package version.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20package%20version?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20package%20version?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Gets provenance for a package version.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/getpackageversionprovenance?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/getpackageversionprovenance?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: True to include urls for each version. Default is true.
Only applicable for NuGet packages. If false, delisted package versions will be returned.
Return deleted or unpublished versions of packages in the response. Default is unset (do not return deleted versions).

request.description:
Get a list of package versions, optionally filtering by state.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20package%20versions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20package%20versions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: Return deleted or unpublished versions of packages in the response. Default is False.
Skip the first N packages (or package versions where getTopPackageVersions=true)
Get the top N packages (or package versions where getTopPackageVersions=true)
Return the description for every version of each package in the response. Default is False.
Only applicable for Nuget packages. Use this to filter the response when includeAllVersions is set to true. Default is True (only return packages without prerelease versioning).
Changes the behavior of $top and $skip to return all versions of each package up to $top. Must be used in conjunction with includeAllVersions=true

Only applicable for NuGet packages, setting it for other package types will result in a 404. If false, delisted package versions will be returned. Use this to filter the response when includeAllVersions is set to true. Default is unset (do not return delisted packages).
True to return all versions of the package in the response. Default is false (latest version only)
True to return REST Urls with the response. Default is True.
Filter to packages that contain the provided string. Characters in the string must conform to the package name constraints.
One of the supported artifact package types.
Filter results to return packages from a specific upstream.

request.description:
Get details about all of the packages in the feed. Use the various filters to include or exclude information from the result set.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20packages?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/artifact%20%20details/get%20packages?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Query a feed to determine its current state.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/change%20%20tracking/get%20feed%20change?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/change%20%20tracking/get%20feed%20change?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: If true, get changes for all feeds including deleted feeds. The default value is false.

A continuation token which acts as a bookmark to a previously retrieved change. This token allows the user to continue retrieving changes in batches, picking up where the previous batch left off. If specified, all the changes that occur strictly after the token will be returned. If not specified or 0, iteration will start with the first change.
Number of package changes to fetch. The default value is 1000. The maximum value is 2000.

request.description:
Query to determine which feeds have changed since the last call, tracked through the provided continuationToken. Only changes to a feed itself are returned and impact the continuationToken, not additions or alterations to packages within the feeds.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/change%20%20tracking/get%20feed%20changes?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/change%20%20tracking/get%20feed%20changes?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: A continuation token which acts as a bookmark to a previously retrieved change. This token allows the user to continue retrieving changes in batches, picking up where the previous batch left off. If specified, all the changes that occur strictly after the token will be returned. If not specified or 0, iteration will start with the first change.
Number of package changes to fetch. The default value is 1000. The maximum value is 2000.

request.description:
Get a batch of package changes made to a feed. The changes returned are 'most recent change' so if an Add is followed by an Update before you begin enumerating, you'll only see one change in the batch. While consuming batches using the continuation token, you may see changes to the same package version multiple times if they are happening as you enumerate.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/change%20%20tracking/get%20package%20changes?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/change%20%20tracking/get%20package%20changes?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

body.raw:
{
    "description": "Sample feed created by postman",
    "hideDeletedPackageVersions": true,
    "badgesEnabled": true,
    "name": "feedbypostman",
    "upstreamEnabled": true,
    "viewId": null,
    "viewName": null,
    "fullyQualifiedName": "feedbypostman",
    "upstreamSources": [
        {
            "id": "40cea34f-c6ef-4898-b379-626926723a16",
            "name": "npmjs",
            "protocol": "npm",
            "location": "https://registry.npmjs.org/",
            "upstreamSourceType": "public"
        },
        {
            "id": "2a28a64e-8822-4bf7-bc7b-5f1475178b36",
            "name": "nuget.org",
            "protocol": "nuget",
            "location": "https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json",
            "upstreamSourceType": "public"
        }
    ],
    "capabilities": "defaultCapabilities"
}

request.description:
Create a feed, a container for various package types.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/create%20feed?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/create%20feed?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Create a new view on the referenced feed.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/create%20feed%20view?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/create%20feed%20view?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

{
    "description": "Sample feed created by postman",
    "hideDeletedPackageVersions": true,
    "badgesEnabled": true,
    "name": "feedbypostman",
    "upstreamEnabled": true,
    "viewId": null,
    "viewName": null,
    "fullyQualifiedName": "feedbypostman",
    "upstreamSources": [
        {
            "id": "40cea34f-c6ef-4898-b379-626926723a16",
            "name": "npmjs",
            "protocol": "npm",
            "location": "https://registry.npmjs.org/",
            "upstreamSourceType": "public"
        },
        {
            "id": "2a28a64e-8822-4bf7-bc7b-5f1475178b36",
            "name": "nuget.org",
            "protocol": "nuget",
            "location": "https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json",
            "upstreamSourceType": "public"
        }
    ],
    "capabilities": "defaultCapabilities"
}

request.description:
Remove a feed and all its packages. The action does not result in packages moving to the RecycleBin and is not reversible.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/delete%20feed?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/delete%20feed?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Delete a feed view.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/delete%20feed%20view?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/delete%20feed%20view?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Get the settings for a specific feed.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feed?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feed?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: True to include user Ids in the response. Default is false.
True to only return explicitly set permissions on the feed. Default is false.
Filter permissions to the provided identity.

request.description:
Get the permissions for a feed.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feed%20permissions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feed%20permissions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: A continuation token which acts as a bookmark to a previously retrieved change. This token allows the user to continue retrieving changes in batches, picking up where the previous batch left off. If specified, all the changes that occur strictly after the token will be returned. If not specified or 0, iteration will start with the first change.
Number of package changes to fetch. The default value is 1000. The maximum value is 2000.

request.description:
Get a view by Id

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feed%20view?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feed%20view?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: A continuation token which acts as a bookmark to a previously retrieved change. This token allows the user to continue retrieving changes in batches, picking up where the previous batch left off. If specified, all the changes that occur strictly after the token will be returned. If not specified or 0, iteration will start with the first change.
Number of package changes to fetch. The default value is 1000. The maximum value is 2000.

request.description:
Get all views for a feed.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feed%20views?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feed%20views?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: Filter by this role, either Administrator(4), Contributor(3), or Reader(2) level permissions.
Include upstreams that have been deleted in the response.

request.description:
Get all feeds in an account where you have the provided role access.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feeds?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/get%20feeds?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Update the permissions on a feed.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/set%20feed%20permissions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/set%20feed%20permissions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Change the attributes of a feed.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/update%20feed?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/update%20feed?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Update a view.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/update%20feed%20view?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/feed%20%20management/update%20feed%20view?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Get information about a package and all its versions within the recycle bin.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/recycle%20%20bin/get%20recycle%20bin%20package?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/recycle%20%20bin/get%20recycle%20bin%20package?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: True to return REST Urls with the response. Default is True.

request.description:

query.description: True to return REST Urls with the response. Default is True.

request.description:

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/recycle%20%20bin/get%20recycle%20bin%20package%20versions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/recycle%20%20bin/get%20recycle%20bin%20package%20versions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: Type of package (e.g. NuGet, npm, ...)
Filter to packages matching this name
True to return REST Urls with the response. Default is True.
Get the top N packages.
Skip the first N packages.
True to return all versions of the package in the response. Default is false (latest version only).

request.description:
Query for packages within the recycle bin.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/recycle%20%20bin/get%20recycle%20bin%20packages?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/recycle%20%20bin/get%20recycle%20bin%20packages?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Get the retention policy for a feed.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/retention%20%20policies/get%20retention%20policy?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/retention%20%20policies/get%20retention%20policy?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Set the retention policy for a feed.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/retention%20%20policies/set%20retention%20policy?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/retention%20%20policies/set%20retention%20policy?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Get all service-wide feed creation permissions.

[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/service%20%20settings/getglobalpermissions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/artifacts/service%20%20settings/getglobalpermissions?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Gets a list of builds

Get available board columns in a project
Returns the list of parent field filter model for the given list of workitem ids

Get all projects in the organization that the authenticated user has access to.

query.description: ProjectState: all, createPending, deleted, deleting, new, unchanged, wellFormed

request.description:
Get all projects in the organization that the authenticated user has access to.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

item.name: Get Project by Id or name

request.description:
Get project with the specified id or name, optionally including capabilities.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/get?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/get?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

item.name: Get Project by Id or name with optional parameters

query.description: Include capabilities (such as source control) in the team project result (default: false).
Search within renamed projects (that had such name in the past).

request.description:
Get project with the specified id or name, optionally including capabilities.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/get?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/get?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Get a collection of team project properties.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/get%20project%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/get%20project%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: A comma-delimited string of team project property names. Wildcard characters ("?" and "*") are supported. If no key is specified, all properties will be returned.

request.description:
Get a collection of team project properties.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/get%20project%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/get%20project%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Queues a project to be created. Use the GetOperation to periodically check for create project status.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/create?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/create?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

item.name: Create or update a team project property

request.description:
Create, update, and delete team project properties.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/set%20project%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/set%20project%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Create, update, and delete team project properties.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/set%20project%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/set%20project%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Queues a project to be deleted. Use the GetOperation to periodically check for delete project status.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/delete?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/projects/delete?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)
Get a process by ID.

Get a list of processes.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/processes/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/processes/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Get a specific team
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/get?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/get?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: If true return all the teams requesting user is member, otherwise return all the teams user has read access
Maximum number of teams to return.
Number of teams to skip.

request.description:
Get a list of all teams.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/get%20all%20teams?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/get%20all%20teams?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: If true return all the teams requesting user is member, otherwise return all the teams user has read access
Maximum number of teams to return.
Number of teams to skip.

request.description:
Get a list of teams in a project.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/get%20teams?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/get%20teams?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

item.name: Get Team Members With Extended Properties

query.description: If true return all the teams requesting user is member, otherwise return all the teams user has read access
Maximum number of teams to return.
Number of teams to skip.

request.description:
Get a list of members for a specific team.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/get%20team%20members%20with%20extended%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/get%20team%20members%20with%20extended%20properties?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Create a team in a team project.
Possible failure scenarios:
* Invalid project name/ID (project doesn't exist) 404 
* Invalid team name or description 400 
* Team already exists 400 
* Insufficient privileges 400
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/create?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/create?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Delete a team.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/delete?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/core/teams/delete?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: A comma separated list of user subject subtypes to reduce the retrieved results, e.g. msa, aad, svc (service identity), imp (imported identity), etc.

An opaque data blob that allows the next page of data to resume immediately after where the previous page ended. The only reliable way to know if there is more data left is the presence of a continuation token.

request.description:
Get a list of all users in a given scope.
Since the list of users may be large, results are returned in pages of users. If there are more results than can be returned in a single page, the result set will containt a continuation token for retrieval of the next set of results.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/graph/users/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/graph/users/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Get a user by its descriptor.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/graph/users/get?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/graph/users/get?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Releases will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included. Note that this will not filter out any Release from results irrespective of whether it has property set or not.
A comma-delimited list of tags. Only releases with these tags will be returned.
Gets the soft deleted releases, if true.
Releases with given sourceBranchFilter will be returned.
Releases with given artifactVersionId will be returned. E.g. in case of Build artifactType, it is buildId.

Unique identifier of the artifact used. e.g. For build it would be {projectGuid}:{BuildDefinitionId}, for Jenkins it would be {JenkinsConnectionId}:{JenkinsDefinitionId}, for TfsOnPrem it would be {TfsOnPremConnectionId}:{ProjectName}:{TfsOnPremDefinitionId}. For third-party artifacts e.g. TeamCity, BitBucket you may refer 'uniqueSourceIdentifier' inside vss-extension.json https://github.com/Microsoft/vsts-rm-extensions/blob/master/Extensions.
Releases with given artifactTypeId will be returned. Values can be Build, Jenkins, GitHub, Nuget, Team Build (external), ExternalTFSBuild, Git, TFVC, ExternalTfsXamlBuild.
The property that should be expanded in the list of releases.
Gets the releases after the continuation token provided.
Number of releases to get. Default is 50.
Gets the results in the defined order of created date for releases. Default is descending.
Releases that were created before this time.
Releases that were created after this time.
Releases that have this status.
Releases created by this user.
Releases with names containing searchText.
Releases from this release definition Id.
A comma-delimited list of releases Ids. Only releases with these Ids will be returned.

request.description:
Get a list of releases
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/release/releases/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/release/releases/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

query.description: A filter which would allow fetching approval steps selectively based on whether it is automated, or manual. This would also decide whether we should fetch pre and post approval snapshots. Assumes All by default

A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Release will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included.
A property that should be expanded in the release.
Number of release gate records to get. Default is 5.

request.description:
Get a Release
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/release/releases/get%20release?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/release/releases/get%20release?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)

Get logs for a release Id.
Response media types: "application/zip", you can click *Download* to save the zip folder.
[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/release/releases/get%20logs?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/release/releases/get%20logs?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)
